summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Randy L. Thompson. The documents primarily focus on Joachim S. Beer (aka Joachim F. Pehl), the step-son of Henry S. Beer. The reports detail derogatory information found on Joachim S. Beer, including reports of a fire and disturbing the peace while serving in the US Army Berlin Brigade. The documents also include personal information, military service details, and security clearance status of Joachim F. Beer.
significance: Randy L. Thompson is not mentioned in the provided documents, so there is no significance to report in the JFK context.
